chapter.title: Touch Developer Guide
chapter.para: TOUCH is the application that comes with the textbook A Touch of Class. It is the framework for the examples and exercises that you find in the book. A Touch of Class is used to teach programming to students in the first semester. The examples are based on TRAFFIC [sa05] a library that models a city and its transportation connections. The visual presentation is done using EiffelMedia (which is a further development of ESDL [tgb03])

This documentation will guide you through the source code of Touch
